desc: Happiness can be found, even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
name: Harry Potter

desc: It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
name: Harry Potter

desc: Not all those who wander are lost.
name: Lord of the Rings

desc: Our adventure is not done yet!
name: Charles Lamb

desc: Never forget what you are, the rest of the world will not. Wear it like armor and it can never be used to hurt you.
name: Game of Thrones
